Package squidpony.squidgrid.iterator

Class SquidIterators.Linear

java.lang.Object
squidpony.squidgrid.iterator.SquidIterators.Linear
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Iterator<Coord>, SquidIterator
Direct Known Subclasses:
SquidIterators.Down, SquidIterators.Left, SquidIterators.Right, SquidIterators.Up
Enclosing class:
SquidIterators
public static class SquidIterators.Linear
extends java.lang.Object
implements SquidIterator
An iterator to iterate from a starting position (inclusive) and going in one Direction. This iterator stops when reaching the map's bound.
Author:
smelC
